question: Which of the following is routing protocol?
Name the protocol which uses hop count as a routing metric to find the best path between the source and the destination network?
Which one of the following is TRUE about interior Gateway routing protocols - Routing Information Protocol (RIP) and Open Shortest Path First (OSPF)?

answers.a: RIP uses distance vector routing and OSPF uses link state routing
answers.b: OSPF uses distance vector routing and RIP uses link state routing
answers.c: Both RIP and OSPF use link state routing
answers.d: Both RIP and OSPF use distance vector routing

question: OSPF is an example of interior gateway protocol?
